title: Poison Ivy bush

properties.name: description
properties.value: Poison ivy bushes are berry bushes that may be grown with the Farming skill at level 70 Farming. A poison ivy bush is grown by planting a poison ivy seed in a bush patch using a seed dibber. There is no need to pay a farmer to watch a poison ivy bush grow because poison ivy bushes will never become diseased and no compost is needed. The farmer will instead say "it is pretty hardy stuff, and most animals will avoid eating it."

Poison ivy bushes are berry bushes that may be grown with the Farming skill at level 70 Farming. A poison ivy bush is grown by planting a poison ivy seed in a bush patch using a seed dibber. There is no need to pay a farmer to watch a poison ivy bush grow because poison ivy bushes will never become diseased and no compost is needed. The farmer will instead say "it is pretty hardy stuff, and most animals will avoid eating it."

A poison ivy bush will take 160 minutes to mature. Once mature, the bush will produce a minimum of 4 poison ivy berries at a time. Once any of the Poison ivy berries have been picked, the bush will slowly produce more until all 4 or more are available again at a rate of 1 berry every 20 minutes.

Planting a poison ivy seed in a bush patch grants 120 Farming experience. Checking the health of a poison ivy bush grants 675 Farming experience. Harvesting each berry grants 45 Farming experience, for a minimum of 180 experience for 4 berries. This works out to a minimum of 975 experience from start to finish.

Growing a poison ivy bush is part of the hard tasks from the Ardougne Diary.

Farming info[edit | edit source]

Poison Ivy bushes are disease-free, and therefore have no diseased or dead variants that can be seen in-game.

'''Poison ivy bushes''' are berry bushes that may be grown with the [[Farming]] [[skill]] at level 70 Farming. A poison ivy bush is grown by planting a [[poison ivy seed]] in a [[bush patch]] using a [[seed dibber]]. There is no need to pay a farmer to watch a poison ivy bush grow because poison ivy bushes will never become diseased and no compost is needed. The farmer will instead say "it is pretty hardy stuff, and most animals will avoid eating it."

A poison ivy bush will take 160 minutes to mature. Once mature, the bush will produce a minimum of 4 [[poison ivy berries]] at a time. Once any of the Poison ivy berries have been picked, the bush will slowly produce more until all 4 or more are available again at a rate of 1 berry every 20 minutes.

Planting a poison ivy seed in a bush patch grants 120 Farming [[experience]]. Checking the health of a poison ivy bush grants 675 Farming experience. Harvesting each berry grants 45 Farming experience, for a minimum of 180 experience for 4 berries. This works out to a minimum of 975 experience from start to finish.

Growing a poison ivy bush is part of the hard tasks from the [[Ardougne Diary]].
